document.full_text: in elk grove, calif., a bold plan for a civic center ' put on hold since the recession ' is back on, but the city's new leaders are resisting ideas from the architect zaha hadid.
document.title: star architect's civic center design divides california city
lines_and_colors: in elk grove, calif., a bold plan for a civic center ' put on hold since the recession ' is back on, but the city's new leaders are resisting ideas from the architect zaha hadid.
